metadata.title: Coscientist: Tokens ≠ Knowledge
metadata.description: Cognitive augmentation infrastructure for better research.

hero.title:
Research at the
Speed of Thought
hero.subtitle: A research platform that thinks for itself.
hero.description: Cognitive augmentation infrastructure for better research.

features.heading: Different from the start, by design

dialecticalGraph.title: Dialectical graph
dialecticalGraph.description: Research entities are connected not by simple links, but by claims and relations. Every sentence can be mathematically traced to its evidence.

rebuttalFirst.title: Rebuttal first
rebuttalFirst.description: It doesn't flatter like other AIs. Instead, it relentlessly attacks the gaps.

multilingual.title: Native multilingual
multilingual.description: English papers. Korean hypotheses. Japanese datasets. One unified research graph.

pipeline.heading: Multi-agent debate architecture
pipeline.description: Multi-agent AI debates internally. You only see the arguments that survive to the end.

audiences.engineers: Engineers building on the latest papers
audiences.teams: Teams that need reproducible knowledge paths

buildInPublic.heading: We build in public
buildInPublic.description: Every architectural decision, trade-off, and technical choice is documented and recorded. If knowledge systems demand traceability, the tools that enable it should be built the same way.

cta.heading:
Asimov's Encyclopedia Galactica was fiction.
We aim to build it for real.
